Afghanistan: Overthrow of the unpopular Turk Shah Lagaturman by his minister Kallar and establishment of the Hindu Shahi dynasty.
Latvia: The Danish king marshalled a great fleet and sailed to Courland in order to take over their goods and to make the Curonians pay tribute to instead. The Curonians gathered forces from all five of their towns and butchered half the Danish army and plundered their war ships.
Spain: Ramiro died.  He was buried in the Pantheon of Asturian Kings in Oviedo.  His son Ordo√±o I of Asturias succeeded him as king.
